headline: Tyler Technologies (TYL) Is Down 18.1% After US$1 Billion Buyback And AI Court Tech Deal - Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: Tyler Technologies, Inc. recently announced that its board approved an open-ended share repurchase program authorizing up to US$1.00 billion of its Class A Common Stock, alongside a definitive agreement to acquire digital court-recording specialist For The Record for about US$212.50 million in cash. Together, the sizeable buyback authorization and the acquisition of AI-powered courtroom transcription capabilities highlight Tyler’s focus on capital return while deepening its courts and...

headline: Tyler Technologies (TYL) Surges 3.4%: Is This an Indication of Further Gains?
summary: Tyler Technologies (TYL) witnessed a jump in share price last session on above-average trading volume. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions for the stock suggests that there could be more strength down the road.
